description: Warm concern and empathy - attentive care directed outward, distinct from personal sadness or panic.
actor_description: My focus goes straight to them. I can't ignore it. I feel the pull to help—steady, practical care rising up before I even decide. I want to ease whatever they're carrying, even if I can only do something small.
description_text: Worry and care soften {actor}'s face as they step forward, eyes full of concern—attention fixed on whoever needs help.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: I hear a gentler tone in {actor}'s voice—questions asked softly, like they're trying not to make things worse.
alternate_descriptions.tactile: Near {actor}, there's a grounded steadiness—an intent, careful presence that feels like support offered without pressure.
